website_summaries.verdict: Organic cotton makes these soft, supple sheets a great choice for babies with sensitive skin.
pros: Good for babies with eczema and other sensitive skin conditions
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: A little snug on some mattresses, but tight-fitting sheets are recommended for young infants

customer_reviews.title: Beware "Sky" color is green
customer_reviews.text: Seem like nice enough sheets, but the sky color, which assumed was a blue or gray, but was unable to tell by the pic, is like a light green. Why on earth would you call a color sky that is green. Call it mint or something. Frankly I will use them anyway as back up because we have them and the baby is coming too soon to be concerned but they dont go with anything in my blue and gray nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stolz-Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for dog bed cover too!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our two dogs shared bed and it works awesome! I got the idea from my sister-in-law because she thought it would be about the right size and she was spot on. The dogs have been alternating between two of these (blue and grey) for a few months now and haven’t ripped either or even made them look worn at all. They are so soft and seem very durable. These are great! When we need to replace we will definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: User Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this sheet! When our daughter started sleeping on her tummy we noticed she also started waking up every couple hours in the middle of the night. I realized she needed something softer under her face to keep her from waking up. These sheets have done just the trick so far! They're so soft and comfy like sleeping on a t-shirt. The only negative is that the pink is much brighter than pictured more like a true pink than a light blush pink. Oh well, they still look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Trick

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft but NOT durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sheets. They are sure soft and fit great. However! On the second wash there are small holes forming around the elastic corners. I am very disappointed as I have always experienced good quality with Burts Bees in the past. I have crappy Walmart sheets that haven't shown any wear after a year and a half and these started tearing after 1 use. (Wahsed before putting on the crib, then washed again).
customer_reviews.author: mra63081

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received this item in pkg w/ a stain/ and sticker. Ewwww
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: Will NEVER buy again!
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the first package (I ordered two) I was SUPER happy! They were soooo soft. But then as I unfolded the first one there were a TON of yellow stains all over it!!! Disgusting!! A “brand new” white sheet with yellow stains?? No thanks! I opened the second one expecting the same thing, and although no stains there were little particles of something all over it I had to shake off and there were already loose threads. I’m gonna keep them for backups but I’ll never order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft. Perfectly white. I washed before placing on crib and it is a little tight and snug which is a good thing but you have to continue to adjust each corner to get it on. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Chelsa Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, great quality. They’re not so tight that they’re hard to put on a standard mattress, but still tight enough that there aren’t many (or any) ripples in the sheets that newborns would have to worry about. We bought lots of different organic crib sheets for our toddler, and these Burt’s Bees and Touched by Natire organic cotton sheets are our favorites by far!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft and cool, but the mattress shows through
customer_reviews.text: The fitted crib sheet is of high quality and is 100% cotton. It feels soft and cool. And since it’s all cotton, there are no chemicals. One thing to be aware of is that it is rather thin and somewhat see through. If you have a mattress with bright colors, they will likely show through.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: horrible.. i was very excited about getting this since this is the first time ever using an organic/burts bees fitted sheet before and seeing all the good reviews i thought it was worth a try. I just received this and right away i noticed i got the wrong color, i ordered grey but i got light blue, i also smelled a strong musty/moldy smell like it was sitting in the washer, and it feels so crusty like it dried up from being wet. It didnt feel soft at all i have fitted sheets that was a lot cheaper and softer than this.. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nick Redding

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I got a great deal on this sheet for under ten bucks. I've used it of/on for the past 6 months and it's heavenly. It begins to stretch a small bit after my 2 year old jumps on it for a week in the crib. It washes and dries beautifully and is comfy and soft. This is THE crib sheet to have. I have both Carter's and Target that have stretched out. I have another minky sheet, and just regular cotton-about 6 or 7 crib sheets total but but this is my favorite! It has elastic all the way around making it superior to many others.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit a rectangular bassinet like it shows in photos... no where close!
customer_reviews.text: I got these sheets for my daughter and the crib sheets are amazing so I bought them for my son who will be here in a few days. I also saw they now have bassinet sheets so I got two of those as well. The bassinet sheets fit nicely on the uppa baby bassinet- there is a little left over but I can tuck it. But here is my problem - they show in photos they also fit on rectangular bassinet... LIES! They DO NOT fit a rectangular bassinet style! So please don’t purchase thinking that they will. FYI the exact bassinet I’m talking about is the baby home dream home bassinet. Very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Jost

customer_reviews.title: Great in all the ways!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. I generally buy cotton sheets from Target, but I am donating all of those for all of the Burts Bees sheets. These sheets are very soft. They have amazing stretch so they fit all the way around the mattress without being so tight that it almost buckled the mattress. The elastic goes all the way around all sides and the fit is perfect. No loose bunch fabric that is unsafe for baby and not so tight that it will ruin your mattress. The price is great! I want these sheets for my own bed! (Please Burts Beets, make all sizes of sheets for people to LOVE)
customer_reviews.author: Joy1214

customer_reviews.title: probably the best crib sheet I have bought so far
customer_reviews.text: soft sheets. probably the best crib sheet I have bought so far. Fits mattress perfectly. My only problem is that there was a small defect. There is a small patch of bunched material on the inside of the sheet. I noticed it when I opened them but it didn't bother me since it was on the inside. But now that they have been washed the part with the bunched material has become a hole. So just inspect the sheet incase you need to return.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheet with super snug fit
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is very soft and provides a tighter fit to our crib mattress (Colgate) than other brands (specifically pottery barn and Aden and Anais). It provides such a tight fit that it can be a little difficult to get over the mattress, however once it’s on, there are no wrinkles or other bunches in the fabric. The sheet stays this snug after several days of use. The surface is always soft and perfectly smooth. All other brands of sheets I have tried loosen, wrinkle, or bunch after use. The sheet has also held up well after several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: They fit medium to large dog beds for easy laundering and changing.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to cover dog beds. They are about the right size for up to a medium-large donut shaped bed, or a large pad style bed. They get more robust use in this application as dogs are more active around their beds than babies. So, they get holes in them within a few weeks. On the other hand, they are the best way to keep dog beds clean and free of fleas and ticks by frequent washing.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. W. C. kasten

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Fit for Safety 1st Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet is see through and does not fit the Safety 1st bassinet mattress/pad, which must be a little longer than other bassinets. It’s so tight it makes the pad fold a little in the center, creating an uncomfortable bump. I bought and washed two white sheets before realizing the problem. They are also not soft. I would return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: rsheffield

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Fits my standard baby crib mattress, I bought the dark blue jersey and I like it! Looks nice and feels nice. Just purchased a Burt’s bees cotton one as well to have an extra so I’ll see the difference once it arrives. This one isn’t very thick r anything but seems nice, durability I’ll change with time once I see how it holds up -since it’s only been a couple weeks. Please let me know if this review was helpful to you - or not! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: KaitlynTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These are the sheets you want to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have the bassinet and regular crib sheets. Both are great! I love that they are organic cotton. They are super soft and comfy. Both sheets fit great on standard crib and bassinet mattresses, snug on the mattress with no dangerous slack or looseness. These also are great with keeping away moisture. My son drools quite a bit and as you can see from the picture his drool just beaded up and sat right on the sheet.. the other spots he actually smeared into the sheet so they are actual wets spots but I use a mattress protector underneath so the mattress doesn’t get ruined. Highly recommend these sheets! And great for the price too
customer_reviews.author: AmberS

customer_reviews.title: Good buy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these and they are great! I tried this one on the crib mattress to make sure it fit ok then washed. It was a little tighter to get on after washing so there is some shrinkage. But it’s nice and soft & during the colder months I think it helps to keep little ones warmer. Although we do use throughout year and seasons too. The sheets are really durable after many washes, no thinning or tears. Good quality that lasts which makes the price easier to accept.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!! These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: 5 STARS These sheets are fantastic! My baby hates being cold and I was worried that the crispness of a regular cotton crib sheet would be too cold for this upcoming winter so I got a couple of these jersey knit sheets for the winter. They are great quality, were easy to wash, feel wonderfully soft, and you know you’re getting a quality organic product when you see Burt’s Bees brand on anything! My baby sleeps wonderfully on them and I am a happy mom knowing she isn’t as cold on them. Would highly recommend this!!! I know these sheets will last a long time for my baby and any future babies I have after her!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Soft, durable, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say? They're soft, wash & dry well, they hold up to average use, AND they're organic. We are pleased and have purchased more. The heather grey color is my favorite as spots have washed off (or are not visible as they are with the lighter colors like the "sky" blue).
customer_reviews.author: Alias

customer_reviews.title: Favorite crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite sheet for my baby boy. Is alot thicker and better quality than others I've purchased from Walmart and Target. They are more expensive but worth it. Have been really impressed with all the baby products I've gotten from burt bees. Pros: Soft Good quality Fits crib mattress really well Been using for 4mo and color hasn't faded at all (many washes from spit up etc) Cons: A bit more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Soft, not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Started using this crib sheet 4 months ago, rotating it with other, non Burts Bees cotton sheets. This one is not holding up. It already has holes in it. Sheets that I got 8 years ago with my firstborn and have gone through 2 boys are still without holes. Disappointing. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: Too pink
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of the pink ones because I liked the pale blush color in the pictures. Nope, this is straight up cotton candy. I'm keeping them because babies go through a lot of sheets and it never hurts to have extra but this is not what I was looking for for my daughter's nursery. They're soft and held up to first wash. They get pretty wrinkled and stay that way. They're not bad for the price. I just wish they had been as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Hamburger

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are super soft, I love them for that. However, if baby spits up on these sheets and it's not found till morning, it is too late to get the stain out. I've tried what I can as my son has very sensitive skin and can't tolerate Spray and Wash or any other really good stain removers. So I've accepted the fact that they may be stained. No biggie, I just change the sheet to one of my unstained sheets if company is coming over. He doesn't care what his sheets look like, he sleeps fine either way.
customer_reviews.author: Review Mama

customer_reviews.title: Softest Organic cotton you will ever feel
customer_reviews.text: Softest Organic cotton you will ever feel . LOVE LOVE LOVE the only reason I gave it a 4 stars for stretch is because I about broke my fingers stretching the elastic around the last two corners I thought I was going to break it on the last one but it finally went, hopefully it will be easier and stretch better next time around I also bought the Bamboo mattress topper too, pure perfection <3<3
customer_reviews.author: VBowers

customer_reviews.title: The Only Sheets Good Enough For My 1st Grandchild
customer_reviews.text: I had no ideas Burt's Bee's made sheets. I had them shipped to my daughter who is due in the next few weeks with my first grandchild. She called me as soon as she opened them to tell me how amazing these sheets felt and how she wants a set for her bed. She doesn't want to use any other sheets and asked me to get a few more in different colors. At this price I can totally do that.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin babies
customer_reviews.text: I love Burt’s Bees crib bedding. I was skeptical at first because of the huge price difference between them and other brands but decided to give them a try given the reviews. I’m so glad I did. They are half the price of what I was looking at and amazingly soft. Burst has such pretty prints and it’s gentle on my baby girl whom has sensitive skin/eczema issues. I love them. I want every print and color .
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Soft but stains easily
customer_reviews.text: Super soft sheets but stained after one spit up. I got it in the washer fast too but it didn't make a difference. Too bad. I know they are clean but seeing that stain just makes me feel like I'm putting my baby on a dirty sheet.
customer_reviews.author: CaitlinDevereaux

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, has stood the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these sheets for about a year now, and washed them at least 40 or 50 times each (my son is potty training..) They're still in as good of shape as they were when I bought them, and the elastic hasn't loosened at all. they fit his mattress very tightly (I wish mine fit like these do) and I'm not worried at all about them bunching up. I love that they're organic too. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheet but check for holes before you put it on your crib mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and natural this sheet feels! I’m big on texture and prefer things to not feel scratchy or stiff, I assume my baby will be just like me in that way (haha). So with that in mind, I wanted to make sure she has great sheets to sleep on! These sheets feel perfect, like a nice soft t-shirt type of material! My only complaint is that the sheet came with a small hole in it. It’s not a big deal, but I’d obviously prefer a brand new sheet with no hole. Other than the hole, these sheet seem perfect!
customer_reviews.author: GraceO

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our third child when i realized we were low on crib sheets (two cribs in use now). Wish I would have found these for my other kids. These are awesome. Really soft, stretchy and actually fits the crib mattress well... not like our other sheets where I have to fight to get them around all four corners. I really really love these.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: So soft. My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are fabulous! So soft and they stay looking new after many washes. I chose dark gray - my baby tends to throw up often and all her other sheets are mainly white (mom fail!). The gray has been a wonderful choice. I intend to purchase several other colors in the future. I love the quality of Burts Bees products
customer_reviews.author: hollyb28

customer_reviews.title: Best sheet ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sheet I have ever owned, hands down. It fits perfectly on my daughter's 27"x52" toddler bed. The design makes it suitable for similarly sized beds, so you don't have to worry about the measurements not being a perfect match. Fits tightly without stretching out the material, and doesn't crumple or bunch up like most sheets do. Easy to wash and it didn't bleed any color, shrink, or lose its elasticity. I wish they made this sheet in standard adult sizes as well. Note on color: The navy blue is much darker than I expected. It looks black until you get up close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Burt’s Bees sheets are of nice quality and softness. The fabric does not seem to stretch and make an unsafe crib environment like other sheets can. It stays taught on the mattress but is very soft and snuggly for our baby. Our set has only been laundered a handful of times, but they seem to be the same as when they first arrived. Our only complaint is that they are definitely pricey in comparison to other brands, but you do pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sheet!! My baby has VERY sensitive skin - we battled with eczema and hypersensitivity rash her early months. Almost everything seemed to irritate her. We had Muslin sheets initially, but when she started to sleep on her belly, her face would turn red. We had gone through many brands and this is the only one where she didn't react.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: I accidentally bought two
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought two, but my wife loves them. Makes laundry much easier having two. We have been fortunate with no 'blow outs' on this crib sheet so I can't comment on ease of cleaning. However, we have never once had to worry about the sheet coming off while our son is in the crib. Great buy, even two.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, so soft!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on sale, I think it was thirteen instead of twenty. Compared to the crib sheets I've bought in the past for seven or eight a piece, I think made by American standard, this is sooo much better. The thickness and softness is just great. Really happy we bought this. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thorell

customer_reviews.title: I only use Burt's Bees sheets for my son
customer_reviews.text: Since he was born, I have only used Burt's Bees sheets for my son. They are soft and very stretchy. I have seen some sheets shrink and not be able to be pulled taught over the crib mattress, but this is not a problem with Burt's Bees. There is always plenty of material and stretch to secure the sheet to the mattress. We have three sets!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few different crib sheet and these are my favorite. Super soft and stretchy. They also wrap around the mattress a lot more than other brands. Other brands barely wrap around the edge to the point that it looks that they might pop off. These don’t do that and are very secure and are made out of a nice, soft, t-shirt material.
customer_reviews.author: Mary G.

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this, but as soon as I got it out of the package I was in love . I love the color and it is so soft . Just like it says , it’s as soft as a favorite old t shirt . I washed it and put it away as a spare for my sons toddler bed . I’m going to put it on this weekend. I know my son is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: These sheets are so nice! Soft
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so nice! Soft, thick and very well made. Deep corners make putting them on easy and they stay put and don't stretch out like a lot of jersey sheets. I love Burt's Bees Baby clothes and pjs, and I'm so pleased with these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Ilea Angaza

customer_reviews.title: Hold up great in the wash
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I do not give five star is because these are a bit tighter than another pair of Burt’s bees sheets we have, making them the set I don’t prefer to put on. I kinda get scared to break a nail putting these on lol. But tight sheets are safe so, not too much harm. Just not sure why they differ. Hold up great in the wash. No stains yet although we’ve had blow outs on them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Casberry

customer_reviews.title: The softest sheets!
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest crib sheet! I will be ordering 2 more of these as I don’t want my baby to sleep on anything else! With him sleeping face down most of the time (he chooses to sleep like this. He’s almost a year old and has been crawling for months and now walking- so he’s safe) I want him to have the softest material on his skin. These are perfect and well worth the $10 extra dollars in comparison to the first sheets I bought for him.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for nice cotton mini-sheets since I bought that stupid mini-crib before my baby was born. Hundreds of spit-up and diaper blowouts later and all the original sheets are ruined and I haven't been able to find nice ones ever until now! Stock-up if you get these because they are soft, wash well, fit mini-mattresses great, and are just nice simple sheets!
customer_reviews.author: A. Eyre

customer_reviews.title: Alright, sooooo....
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this in the post! It’s sooooo soft and my daughter sleeps like the dead. The only thing that I didn’t really like is that, it didn’t quite fit my daughters mattress (too small). I had to have my husband help me put it on but, it still somewhat fits? I would still recommend! I’ve never had anything to complain about when it comes with Burt’s Bees.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet like no other
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet is the best! I use it as a dog bed cover. It is very soft and has a cotton t-shirt feeling that my dog loves. It is thicker than any fitted crib sheet I have come across and of course it is a breeze to clean- just toss it in the washer!
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well with pack’n’play
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the full-sized crib version of this sheet and loved it, so I thought I would love the mini-crib version, stated to fit a standard pack’n’play mattress. The thing I love about the full-size is the downfall of the mini; the elastic is too tight. The pack’n’play mattress has sections allowing it to fold around the unit for travel and storage. This sheet hugs the mattress so tight that it caused these sections to slightly overlap, shrinking the overall size of the mattress, leaving a gap between the mattress and the pack’n’play walls. I will not use this and do not believe I can return it since I’ve washed it and threw out the packaging :(
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and soft. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my daughters crib. From all the sheets with all 3 of my kids i have used, these are by far my favorite! I bought 3 colors, the blue, pink and grey. Very soft, fits nicely on the crib, the blue on is very snug but fits fine. Ive washed numerous times already and no fade in color or softness. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Le

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy!
customer_reviews.text: I got a trifold mattress that is both longer and thinner than a normal toddler mattress and the stretchiness of it is incredible. It fits perfectly with out it being stretch out and saggy. It holds its shape. Very happy, it’s been difficult finding a sheet that fits this bed
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Nelson

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite sheets that we have used on our son’s bed! I honestly wish I had never bought another brand because the two sets of these we bought are the only ones we use now. They are so soft and only get softer and more comfy with each wash. Whenever we (rarely) put another brand sheets on his bed, even he can tell the difference and will start pulling at them as if to try and pull them off the bed. Lol. I would recommend these to anyone time and time again!
customer_reviews.author: Kels D

customer_reviews.title: The best crib sheets ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely satisfied with my Burt’s bees crib sheets, I decided to stick with the brand. I bought me four so far (my baby has severe acid reflux) so I have to keep them changed. They are so soft and the perfect thickness. I will never buy a different brand. Not to mention Amazon is so quick at getting it delivered to you!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn K.

customer_reviews.title: We love these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I knew these would be good sheets because burts beez makes them. We really love them! They are nice and soft and have deep pockets. We use a bumper that goes under the sheet and it still fits on his bed nice. They fit the bed well and dont scrunch up wrinkle or come off during the night. These are by far our favorite toddler sheets. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shandi

customer_reviews.title: softest fitted crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: This crib sheet has quickly become my favorite. It is very soft and holds up well in the wash. Love that it is plain white - it's hard to find nice, plain white crib sheets. I had also purchased a couple of organic fitted crib sheets from Pottery Barn Kids and those are not nearly as soft as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are the only sheets we buy for my son’s crib! They are super soft and are the only sheets we’ve been able to find that are deep enough to go all the way around the crib mattress without riding up, causing a suffocation hazard. We also love that they don’t shrink in the wash! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea A.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, durable, beautiful, great value!
customer_reviews.text: These full sized contour baby bed sheets are as promised, & more! They are very soft. They come out of the dryer unwrinkled, & they seem durable. I bought a white one & a blue one. I’ve washed one of them several times. I didn’t compare the price to those sold in stores but the price seems economical. They are royal baby worthy!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. They are the best sheet I have found to be able to add “bumpers” under them and they still are able to go around the mattress snug and they don’t ride up. they are also very soft and my son loves them. I will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are my absolute favorite for my son's crib. They are soooo soft and reasonably priced for such a quality item. I bought one, and then loved it so much that I bought more after I used the first one and realized how great they were. Would absolutely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Super soft but does fade slightly
customer_reviews.text: I have this crib sheet in both the navy and grey. I love how soft they are and my son does too. They seem to launder better than the burts bees changing covers which are the same material but they do fade slightly and attract lint - we just use a lint roller and it alleviates the issue but I could see this being a problem for some people.
customer_reviews.author: KPITTTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra for Burts Bees sheets!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to buy other crib sheets to save money--as you know you need a lot of back ups, but it's worth it to spend the extra 5-7$ per sheet to get the quality. They are soft, they hold up well through wash, and they FIT very comfortably around the mattress! Nothing gets to a tired, cranky parent like trying to change a crib sheet that doesn't fit easily on the mattress ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I got a variety of crib sheets at my shower, however I only use the Burts Bee sheets. They wash up great, do not fade and they are thick enough that you dont see the mattress pattern through these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B.

customer_reviews.title: Stitched tag very visible!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super soft, great color and price BUT has the Burt’s logo stitched smack dab where baby’s head or feet would be. Would rather not see this in crib and also I could see my lil guy trying to pick at it in the morning. Such a bummer. Can you move the tag down a couple inches so would not see it??
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Fits mattress very well
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is organic and (hopefully) isn't full of chemicals. It fit the memory foam standard mattress I have very well. At first I thought it was going to be too small, but it just fits very tightly so there is no loose or extra fabric, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Alcrea

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest sheets ever! I am jealous that I can’t get any for my bed, please Burt’s Bees make adult sheets! Worth the extra cost and I feel good using these for my soon to be baby. A beautiful shade of Navy that will work for both boys or girls
customer_reviews.author: AlyssaJ

customer_reviews.title: ... correct i washed it before to try it my bad now can't return it
customer_reviews.text: too small your measurements aren't correct i washed it before to try it my bad now can't return it
customer_reviews.author: So

customer_reviews.title: Love how soft the fabric is
customer_reviews.text: Love how soft the fabric is. I have has these sheets for almost two years now and they have held up remarkably. I haven't had any pilling ( I use seventh generations free and clear detergent) and they are still as soft as when I first got them. I am so happy with them and if you find them on sale stock up!
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug but has enough stretch to easily go over the corners
customer_reviews.text: Very soft fabric. Fits snug but has enough stretch to easily go over the corners. Will order more of the Burts bees cotton jersey crib sheets.
customer_reviews.author: darcy

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, great for puppy road trips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheet to cover the back seat of my car and prevent puppy accidents. I placed puppy pads directly on my back seat and then covered them with this sheet and the combination worked perfectly. This sheet fit my backseat wonderfully. I just tucked a little extra fabric in between the seats. It’s very soft and easy to remove and launder.
customer_reviews.author: C. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and quality material
customer_reviews.text: My poor child sleeps on his stomach and has very sensitive skin. His cheeks would get easily irritated from previous crib sheets so I needed something softer. This sheet is so soft and reflects the quality of the brand. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and soft sheet. We have had this sheet for a month and a half and we’ve washed it about twice a week. It’s hels up wonderfully and hasn’t faded or piled. My son has eczema so I wanted something soft for his skin. This is perfect. And it fits very snugly. We would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: oacale

customer_reviews.title: Had a hole after a week's use
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft but had a big hole in it right by the Burt's Bees label that I didn't notice until after we'd used it for a week. Not sure when it got there but it definitely shouldn't be getting holes that easily especially since my baby is only 5 months old so he didn't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharli Ruth

customer_reviews.title: no bad smell and very soft !!
customer_reviews.text: normally when you receive new item. it smells bad from the factory or something. but this one doesn't smell and very soft for my baby. always trust the burt's bee products. thank you !! I love it
customer_reviews.author: kathy Yoo

customer_reviews.title: SOFT AND ORGANIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very soft and fit my daughters crib perfectly.They arnt super thick but with all of the products that use so many chemicals now days I was super excited to get these 100% organic!Plus they're from burt's bees and anything I've ever bought from them has been great products.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: Super soft crib sheets. They wash well and wear well. My kiddos seem to like them but I don't know how much a two year old cares. I however would like a set for my bed. Really nice sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynee

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made fitted crib sheet!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the most fitted crib sheets I've purchased - which is wonderful when it comes to safe sleep for a baby. I actually purchased it for my son's toddler bed, and it works very well there too!
customer_reviews.author: Brig B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft and Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: Very soft right out of the package and equally soft after washing. The heather gray is a really nice shade of gray. The sheet fits my 28"x52" mattress perfectly and snugly (mattress is Lullaby Earth dual-stage crib mattress).
customer_reviews.author: linzer

customer_reviews.title: Please cancel return.
customer_reviews.text: The sheet was difficult to fit on mattress but I finally got it to fit. I love the shade of pink and the very soft feel will be very nice for baby. PLEASE CANCEL RETURN OF THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D.C.M .

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet sheet
customer_reviews.text: It fits our Monte Design Bassinet very well. It is great quality and beats laying 50 dollars that monte wanted for these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Sabina Polnar

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. I ordered a few for my new baby, and they've been in use for about 6 months. However after this short amount of time, these sheets have holes in them on the corners. I am so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality! Very soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BASSINET SHEET! We have both the halo bassinet and the baby delight bassinet and it fits both perfectly. The quality is incredible and the material holds up after washing. It’s so soft! Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah L.

customer_reviews.title: Do it.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the soft cotton of these sheets. I was searching for a stretchy, thick, soft sheet for my daughter and im glad I found these. The tag worried me, but its on the side of the matress, so it doesn't touch your baby at all. I wish it had a bit more stretch, finding a sheet to fit my matress has been a huge struggle, but works better than most other ones I've tried. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: What a GREAT sheet
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is amazing! It stretches nice and tight around my little ones crib mattress so I don't have to worry about the sheet bunching around her. I've put this sheet in the dry several times and it is still doing very well. And I can't forget to mention how SOFT this sheet is! The stretchy band is made of good material so I plan on this sheet lasting a very long time. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hindes57

customer_reviews.title: Soft! But Maybe Too Soft...
customer_reviews.text: One of the sheets basically fell apart during the first wash. It's a shame as the sheets themselves look high quality (and they're soft as the headline suggests) and we were looking forward to using it for our baby.
customer_reviews.author: NamjaSamonim

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is soft and goes with baby’s nursery perfectly! The color is beautiful and I bought the matching diaper changing pad cover! It fits very snugly on a standard crib mattress. If fact the only negative might be how hard it was to get on! But overall, I know that a really snug sheet is safest for baby! I’m buying again in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets but they shrink dramatically in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheets but they shrink dramatically in the dryer, just be aware. I’m sure if I hung them to dry there wouldn’t be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit well on pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Used on pack n play, made the mattress curl up and didn’t feel safe with baby sleeping on it. Wanted it to fit more tightly like a regular fitted crib sheet. Already washed so can’t return
customer_reviews.author: Meredith E.

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 sets of these sheets for my twins in different colors (white/navy/grey). Very soft and easy to put on the mattress. They are 9 months and so far no issues in cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Burt's Bees for the win!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft and comfortable this sheet feels. It's held up well with washings and it looks great in the crib. The Burt's Bees fitted crib sheets and changing pad covers are my favorite. I've gone back to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: talula31

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I had googled the best fabric for a cooling effect and they highly recommend cotton so I ordered this one and it’s really soft and my daughter no longer sweats at night she is always very hot and so i needed to find something that was fresh and soft, this did the job
customer_reviews.author: ELvia

customer_reviews.title: Softest crib sheets!
customer_reviews.text: These are the softest sheets! I wish they made them in king size for our bed. They hold up really well (we’ve been using and washing weekly for about a year and a half). I routinely buy these for mama friends for their showers. I’m 35 weeks pregnant with our second and just bought more to use on her crib, too!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly, crisp, and color free
customer_reviews.text: Soft but crisp. Great price for organic sheets. We bought these ones to leave at daycare for our son. Plus they're easy to get stains out of with regular bleach or sunlight so no need to deal with all the extra chemicals in "color safe" formulas.
customer_reviews.author: mcs1505

customer_reviews.title: Nuna Sena Aire compatible
customer_reviews.text: The mini crib sheets the Nuna Sena Aire well - snug all around. I dug through so many listings for pack and play sheets and the dimensions weren’t quite right. This one does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, stretchy and looks great! What more can you ask for? I got another set of sheets that I love for the design but they are not this soft. These sheets get 5 stars for comfort,
customer_reviews.author: scott bender

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality of this sheet. I bought two different colors and this one was nearly impossible to get on the mattress because the elastic had limited stretch to it. The other color did not have this problem. With some ripping sounds, I was able to get it on. Now, after less than 3 months, it has a hole in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: There is a very noticeable difference between this crib sheet and other brands we've purchased. This is by far the softest and best quality sheet. Being budget conscious, I bought less expensive sheets and now I regret it. These are absolutely worth the extra few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Sheets for Boy or Girl
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s unisex, soft, and easy to wash. The inevitable messes don’t stain this product with the use of a little stain remover and a hot wash. It gets softer with each wash and doesn’t pill. It’s expensive when full priced, but an excellent value when marked down. I highly recommend this product, but if you’re looking for a good deal, wait for a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for Babybjorn
customer_reviews.text: Use this on the Babybjorn bassinet. It is a good fit, not perfect, but good enough to where I feel safe letting my baby sleep on it. I just stretch and tuck the extra material underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: These are so much softer than the Walmart brand ones. I got this for my baby's "snuggle nest" and they fit great. I want some of these for my bed lol! Really cozy material
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Fits our LullaGo Bassinet Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for! I wanted an organic sheet for our LullaGo Bassinet- which is larger than normal sized bassinets. And this fit perfectly! Love the gender neutral color as well :)
customer_reviews.author: kdphoto

product_meta.title: Burt's Bees Baby - Fitted Crib Sheet, Boys Solid Color, 100% Organic Cotton Crib Sheet for Standard Crib and Toddler Mattresses (Navy Blue)
product_meta.description: Color:Navy Blue| Style:Crib SheetBurt's Bees Baby Fitted Crib Sheet - Feels like your favorite tee. 100% organic cotton, GOTS certified, jersey knit baby bedding. Sweet dreams come easy on our soft and cozy 100% organic crib sheets, and organic cotton means that parents can rest easy too. Mix and match our gentle solids and prints for a gorgeous nursery as good for the planet as it is for the little one who sleeps there
feature_bullets: Burt's Bees Baby Fitted Crib Sheet - Solid Color
BEESNUG 360°, premium elastic with extra stretch provides a safer, snugger fit
Extra fabric overlap on bottom edge, along with 360º elastic prevents sheets from creeping up on the mattress, so you and your baby can rest easy
100% organic, GOTS certified, breathable cotton - the purest layer for baby’s thin and porous skin
Dimensions: W28" x L52" - For standard crib and toddler mattresses

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,865 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
